headline: MGM Resorts International and MGM China to Speak at Leveraged Finance Conference
summary: MGM Resorts International (NYSE: MGM) ("MGM Resorts" or the "Company") will participate in the 2024 Bank of America Leveraged Finance Conference on Tuesday, December 3, 2024. Senior leadership from MGM Resorts International and MGM China will speak at a session scheduled to begin at 9:30 a.m. ET. A live webcast of the session will be available under the Events & Presentation section of the MGM Investor Relations website at http://investors.mgmresorts.com
